tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE species_occurrence (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR(50),
  latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
  longitude DECIMAL(11, 8),
  observation_date DATE,
  observation_time TIME,
  observation_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE species_occurrence (
  species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR(255),
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT,
  observation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE climate_impacts (
  impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_id INT,
  impact_type VARCHAR(50),
  impact_description TEXT,
  impact_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE species_occurrence_data (
    species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    occurrence_latitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
    occurrence_longitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
    occurrence_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE species_distribution (
    distribution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_id INT NOT NULL,
    distribution_area VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    distribution_start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    distribution_end_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE species_occurrence (
    occurrence_id INT,
    species_id INT,
    occurrence_date DATE,
    occurrence_location VARCHAR(100),
    temperature FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE species_occurrence (
  species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR(255),
  latitude DECIMAL,
  longitude DECIMAL,
  observation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE species_distribution (
  distribution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_id INT REFERENCES species_occurrence(species_id),
  region VARCHAR(50),
  distribution_probability FLOAT,
  distribution_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE climate_data (
  climate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  region VARCHAR(50),
  temperature DECIMAL,
  humidity DECIMAL,
  wind_speed DECIMAL,
  date_recorded DATE
)

CREATE TABLE species_impact (
  impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_id INT REFERENCES species_occurrence(species_id),
  impact_description TEXT,
  impact_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE species_conservation (
  conservation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_id INT REFERENCES species_occurrence(species_id),
  conservation_status VARCHAR(50),
  conservation_plan TEXT
)
